attributes.action: Break up and sell off the BBC
attributes.background: The BBC was a good organisation that was unbiased and impartial. It has been biased and unbalanced for a few years now. We are fed up with paying for the licence fee for a biased unbalanced organisation and it's high time to sell it off.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may wish to sign this petition, which asks the Government to revoke the BBC's royal charter, and to privatise the company:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/179823

Alternatively, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
